td.content: s:69 YO male presents with progressive moderate nausea, moderate weight loss over several months and moderate weakness for past 8 days. o:Height 75 in, Weight 145 lbs, Temperature 98.3 F, Pulse 79, SystolicBP 109, DiastolicBP 70, Respiration 16 a:Stomach Cancer p:performed E/M Level 2 (new patient) - Completed, and prescribed 5-FU - 1000 mg/m2 IV, cisplatin - 100 mg/m2 IV, and ordered Upper Endoscopy, CBC, Comprehensive Metabolic Panel, CEA.

td.content: s:white male retired aged 69 ys presents w/ c/o 8 days h/o mild easy bruising and mild non pruritic rash. o:Height 75 in, Weight 145 lbs, Temperature 98.3 F, Pulse 79, SystolicBP 108, DiastolicBP 70, Respiration 16, Skin = pink, no pallor, Skin = scattered petechiae a:Idiopathic Thrombocytic Purpura p:performed E/M Level 3 (established patient) - Completed, and prescribed dexamethasone - 40 mg daily x 4 days, and ordered CBC.
